'''Gorgumoth''' was the [[Hounds|hound]] of the [[Valar|Vala]] [[Mandos]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. Gorgumoth guarded [[Melkor|Melko]] in the castle of [[Lumbi]] after he was overthrown by [[Tulkas]] in the [[Battle of the Silent Pools|battle]] of the [[Aelin-uial|Silent Pools]] during the [[War of Wrath|First Faring Forth]].<ref>{{LT2|VI}}, outline '''1''', p. 278</ref>
